Title: Improper Privilege Management in shelljs
Description: Output from the synchronous version of `shell.exec()` may be visible to other users on the same system. You may be affected if you execute `shell.exec()` in multi-user Mac, Linux, or WSL environments, or if you execute `shell.exec()` as the root user. Other shelljs functions (including the asynchronous version of `shell.exec()`) are not impacted.
